title: Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
SR: When selecting a CU (Compilation Unit) in the Packages view and executing the 'File->Add Task' action using the F1 key, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu. The 'Add Task' action should consistently use the same dialog throughout the workbench.
